tool.name: pl.rank_genes_groups_dotplot
tool.description: Plot ranking of genes using dotplot plot (see `scanpy.api.pl.dotplot`)

configfiles.configfile:
import scanpy.api as sc @CMD_set_figure_params @CMD_read_inputs
sc.pl.rank_genes_groups_dotplot( adata = '$adata', groups = '$groups', n_genes = '$n_genes', groupby = '$groupby', key = '$key', show = '$show', save = '$save', ax = '$ax', **kwds = '$**kwds',)

param.name: groups
param.label: groups
param.help: The groups for which to show the gene ranking.

param.name: groupby
param.label: groupby
param.help: The key of the observation grouping to consider. By default, the groupby is chosen from the rank genes groups parameter but other groupby options can be used. It is expected that groupby is a categorical. If groupby is not a categorical observation, it would be subdivided into `num_categories` (see `scanpy.api.pl.dotplot`).

param.name: key
param.label: key
param.help: Key used to store the ranking results in `adata.uns`.

param.name: show
param.label: show
param.help: Show the plot, do not return axis.

param.name: save
param.label: save
param.help: If `True` or a `str`, save the figure. A string is appended to the default filename. Infer the filetype if ending on {'.pdf', '.png', '.svg'}.

param.name: ax
param.label: ax
param.help: A matplotlib axes object. Only works if plotting a single component.

tool.help:
Plot ranking of genes using dotplot plot (see `scanpy.api.pl.dotplot`)
Parameters ---------- adata : :class:`~anndata.AnnData` Annotated data matrix. groups : `str` or `list` of `str` The groups for which to show the gene ranking. n_genes : `int`, optional (default: 10) Number of genes to show. groupby : `str` or `None`, optional (default: `None`) The key of the observation grouping to consider. By default, the groupby is chosen from the rank genes groups parameter but other groupby options can be used. It is expected that groupby is a categorical. If groupby is not a categorical observation, it would be subdivided into `num_categories` (see `scanpy.api.pl.dotplot`). key : `str` Key used to store the ranking results in `adata.uns`. show : `bool`, optional (default: `None`) Show the plot, do not return axis. save : `bool` or `str`, optional (default: `None`) If `True` or a `str`, save the figure. A string is appended to the default filename. Infer the filetype if ending on {'.pdf', '.png', '.svg'}. ax : `matplotlib.Axes`, optional (default: `None`) A matplotlib axes object. Only works if plotting a single component. **kwds : keyword arguments Are passed to `scanpy.api.pl.dotplot`.
